description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              We are looking for a DevOps Engineer with a passion for learning new technologies and a strong interest in infrastructure automation and continuous deployment.
              

              - Must be familiar with the software development cycle and have a strong understanding of security best practices.
              
              - Must be comfortable being involved in the full application stack from infrastructure automation to database optimization and code contributions.
              
              - Will need to work closely with developers to optimize workflow and solve issues.

              ***Benefits:
              
              Successful candidates will be part of friendly, motivated and committed talented team with various benefits. What we offer:
              
              - Working in a very friendly environment where we grow together
              
              - An optimized management system that helps you feel comfortable at work
              
              - Opportunities to work abroad (US, AUS)
              
              - Compliance fully to Vietnam labor code
              
              - Company trip, team-building events
              
              - 13th salary and project bonus
              
              - Work-from-home policy
              
              - Support purchase laptop (50% of the value)
              
              - Extra healthcare package
